We live in East Texas and when my Aunt passed away suddenly and we had to make lodging reservations quickly for the trip out west, we wanted something that would be homey and comfortable for our family. I'm so thankful I found the Cotton Cottage on the AirBnB site. It was just what my family needed during a very sad time and after a very long trip.
First of all the communication with our host before arriving was great. When we pulled up it was everything that was described. Beautiful, clean, homey...we especially loved the back patio area to sit and unwind after our long trip. The home and furnishings were beautiful. I took pictures to share with friends and family. We felt safe, secure and at home. The beds were very comfortable after that long drive and gave us a good nights rest..
Everything we needed for our stay was provided and that was very helpful and convenient.
I requested to be able to check out at a little later time, so after the funeral we could come back, change our clothes and load the car for our 500 mile trip back home. They said that was no problem...and we appreciated that.
There's not much more I can say other than thank you for making our short stay comfortable and relaxing, and should we ever return to Levelland, Texas, I hope the Cotton Cottage will be available!
